headline: ALCATEL ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 4.2 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump     Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.    Alcatel M2004A
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Alcatel
Model M2004A
Pumping Speed 4.2 CFM (118.7 l/m)
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Refurbished YES
Duty--Service Normal
Two-Stage YES
Motor Horsepower .5 HP
Rotational Speed 1,725 RPM
Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 7.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
